name: Super Puzzle Platformer Deluxe
summary: The title says it all. Take one part falling block puzzle game, combine one part old-school platformer, add a couple thousand pixels, blend and serve. Why match colored blocks when you can just shoot the hell out of them? Your goal is to survive as long as you can. From celebrated indie developer Andrew Morrish and Adult Swim Games.
info:
• 发行: Adult Swim Games
  • 别名: Super Puzzle Platformer Plus
  • 别名: Super Puzzle Platformer
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Platformer
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 2013年5月24日
  • 开发: Andrew Morrish
